title: Chintz Fragments, 18th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 3 reds, black and 2 purples applied over resist. Dyed.  Blue applied by immersion over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).
dimensions:
Warp x Weft (a): 58.5 x 66.5 cm (23 1/16 x 26 3/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (b): 8.5 x 10 cm (3 3/8 x 3 15/16 in.)
Warp x Weft (c): 7.5 x 10.5 cm (2 15/16 x 4 1/8 in.)
description: Bars and exotic organic shapes. Component A is five pieces pasted together.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chintz Fragments, 18th century.
18th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for 3 reds, black and 2 purples applied over resist. Dyed.  Blue applied by immersion over resist. Yellow applied by brush (chintz).. Gift of Josephine Howell. 1973-51-63-a/c.
